amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Environmental Protection Agency Science and Technology account by $88,282,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 114-683 to eliminate funding for the Air, Climate and Energy Research Program under EPA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 208 - 217 (Roll no. 425).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 208 - 217 (Roll no. 425).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Smith (MO).
